title: Journey to Love
description: Shamed by her father's drunken indulgences and his promise to sell her as a wife, Rachel Buchanan escapes her house to join a wagon train bound for the West. With her faith in God as Provider; she seeks out Colby Lord, a man she barely knows, begging him to take her along to Oregon. This leads to a quick marriage, carrying with it a strange bargain. As a wife in name only, Rachel cannot love a man she doesn't respect. But through storms, Indian uprisings, and her growing faith in God, Rachel must decide what she really feels for Colby Lord on the Journey to Love.
author: June Masters Bacher
